# hello les gars
## bonjour

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(ofce)
library(dint)
data <- tibble(date = ymd("2019-01-01") + months(3*(0:32)), e = 0:32)
ggplot(data) + 
  aes(x= date, y = e) +
  geom_col(width = 70) +
  tsibble::scale_x_yearquarter(date_breaks = "3 months",
                               limits = c(ymd("2019-11-01"), NA)) +
  theme_ofce() 

```
